ThingDef.label: Wolfein Dustcoat
ThingDef.description: A dust coat designed to protect against wind and sand while shielding from the scorching sunlight.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Wintercoat
ThingDef.description: A winter coat with excellent insulation, ideal for cold outdoor environments.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein suit with sweater
ThingDef.description: A casual combination of a sweater and a jacket, perfect for indoor wear during winter. When needed, the zipper can be pulled up for added warmth.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Outdoor Jacket
ThingDef.description: A Wolfein combat coat, sturdy and durable, designed to provide protection and ease of movement for combatants in harsh environments.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Military Cape
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein military-grade cloak is windproof and waterproof, with the capability to attach a camouflage net, making it a favorite among scouts and snipers.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein MilitaryDustcoat
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein military-grade dustproof coat offers superior protection compared to regular dustproof coats, making it suitable for more extreme environments.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein MilitaryWintercoat
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein military-grade winter coat provides enhanced protection while offering warmth and comfort to Wolfein soldiers, ensuring they stay warm in harsh cold conditions.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein LightweightCombatjacket
ThingDef.description: A lightweight combat jacket, offering comfort and versatility for various combat environments, typically worn in combination with lightweight combat uniforms.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein SpecialmilitaryUniform
ThingDef.description: The combat uniform typically used by the Wolfein in complex operational environments, designed as standard gear for task force mobile units.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein VanguardUniform
ThingDef.description: The Vanguard combat uniform is specifically designed for close-quarters combat, combining lightweight flexibility with solid protective features, giving Wolfein vanguards an edge in melee engagements.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein PsionicCombatSuit
ThingDef.description: A psionic combat suit designed for the Wolfein who use psychic to combat, embedded with mental polymers in its material to enhance the rate of psychic entropy reduction.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein RedCombatSuit
ThingDef.description: A special combat suit that integrates stealth technology with highly efficient tactical functions, worn only by specially trained Wolfein during covert missions.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein RebelDustproofCloak
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein Resistance Army's shoulder cape is typically worn in conjunction with the resistance uniform. Soldiers of higher rank within the resistance are equipped with this shoulder cape as part of their standard attire.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein RebelPowerArmor
ThingDef.description: Modified from the Wolfein Scout Power Armor, the material cost is reduced, but the stability and protection performance are slightly reduced accordingly.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Rebel Heavy Power Armor
ThingDef.description: The heavy power armor used by the Wolfein Resistance has some armor removed and a field-style cape added.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein FlakJacket
ThingDef.description: Wolfein armed personnel often use portable, lightweight bulletproof vests in combat, offering good protection against bullets and stabs.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Heavy FlakJacket
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty bulletproof vest, providing more comprehensive protection compared to a lightweight vest, but at the cost of being bulkier.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Wasteland Splicingcoat
ThingDef.description: A patchwork coat made by Wofen wanderers, stitched together from various worn fabrics and damaged military uniforms. Despite its shabby appearance, it is surprisingly durable and warm.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Scout Power Armor
ThingDef.description: A military power armor made with high-tech fiber materials for its inner lining. It fits the body closely and is lightweight and flexible, providing effective protection against shrapnel and blades, as well as solid bulletproof capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Guard Power Armor
ThingDef.description: A military power armor made with high-tech fiber materials for its inner lining. It fits the body closely and is lightweight and flexible, providing effective protection against shrapnel and blades, as well as solid bulletproof capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Imperial Guard Power Armor
ThingDef.description: The power armor used by the previous generations of the Wolfein tribe retains the royal style of the old times and shows the glory of the past. However, the glory is no longer there, and the power armor has become a relic of the past glory and a symbol of history.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Imperial Scout Power Armor
ThingDef.description: A lightweight reconnaissance power suit recreated based on the royal military doctrines of the previous Wolfein generation, combined with contemporary engineering. It offers exceptional mobility and enhanced sensory systems.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Heavy Power Armor
ThingDef.description: Designed based on the lessons learned from the War with the Mechanoid, this design focuses on maximizing survival rates when facing heavy Mechanoid firepower. However, the exaggerated protection and the requirement for user to use heavy weaponry result in a significant reduction in mobility.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein AIPTDustcoat
ThingDef.description: The AIPT department's standard dust coat has excellent dust and corrosion resistance. It is suitable for unknown biological investigations and on-site processing, providing basic environmental isolation and flexibility of movement.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein AIPT Heavy Power Armor
ThingDef.description: The AIPT task force's specialized powered armor, with enhanced heat resistance compared to the original model, is additionally equipped with two gas canisters, providing enough fuel for the attached flamethrower to operate at full power.
